column2: poppies]] growing in the gardens of [[Lórien (Valinor)
column3: Lórien]] in [[Valinor]]. The ''fumellar'' are said to have glowed "redly in the dusk". The [[Irmo
column4: Vala Lórien]] often used the ''fumellar'' in his enchantments.<ref>{{LT1

column1: The name ''fumellar'' is [[Qenya]]: ''fúmella'', ''fúmellot'' means "poppy". The first element is related to ''fúmë'' ("sleep"; noun).<ref>{{LT1
column2: Appendix}}, p. 253</ref> Variant [[Gnomish]] names for "poppy" are ''humilos'', ''humlos'', ''humethla'', and ''humloth''.<ref>{{PE
